00031 #ifndef HARPS_OUTPUT_ALSA
00032 #define HARPS_OUTPUT_ALSA
00033 
00034 #include <harps/config.hpp>
00035 #include <harps/time.hpp>
00036 #include <harps/exceptions.hpp>
00037 
00038 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00039 
00040 #include <alsa/asoundlib.h>
00041 
00042 namespace harps {
00046   namespace output {
00050     template< bool is_stereo, unsigned int bytes_per_sample >
00051       class ALSA {
00052         public:
00057           ALSA( const char *_filename ) : system_time( 0.0 ) {
00058             int open_result = snd_pcm_open( &pcm_raw, _filename, SND_PCM_STREAM_PLAYBACK, 0 );
00059             if( open_result )
00060               throw UnableToOpenSink();
00061             pcm.reset( pcm_raw, &snd_pcm_close );
00062             int param_result =
00063               snd_pcm_set_params( pcm_raw, SND_PCM_FORMAT_S16_LE, SND_PCM_ACCESS_RW_INTERLEAVED,
00064                                   1, SAMPLING_RATE, 1, 20000 );
00065             if( param_result )
00066               throw SinkConfigurationFailed();
00067           }
00071           virtual ~ALSA() {}
00076           template< typename SampleType >
00077             void operator()( Buffer< SampleType > &_buffer ) {
00078               int index;
00079               typename Buffer< SampleType >::SampleType *left_raw_buffer = _buffer.getLeft();
00080               typename Buffer< SampleType >::SampleType *right_raw_buffer = _buffer.getRight();
00081               int16_t int_buffer[ SAMPLE_COUNT ];
00082               for( index = 0; index != SAMPLE_COUNT; index++ )
00083                 int_buffer[ index ] = static_cast< int16_t >( left_raw_buffer[ index ] * ( 32767 - 4096 ) );
00084               int write_result = snd_pcm_writei ( pcm_raw, static_cast< const void* >( int_buffer ), SAMPLE_COUNT );
00085               if( write_result < 0 ) {
00086                 write_result = snd_pcm_recover( pcm_raw, write_result, 0 );
00087                 if( write_result < 0 ) {
00088                   throw SinkOutputFailed();
00089                 }
00090               }
00091             }
00092           private:
00093             snd_pcm_t *pcm_raw;
00094             boost::shared_ptr< snd_pcm_t > pcm;
00095             double system_time;
00096       };
00097   }
00098 }
00099 
00100 #endif
